page.title: 08LOCHALSH BUSINESS MAN
page.content: Mr J.F.Munro is the main local employer.He runs a general building and haulage business and employs 17 people two of whom are in the office.He started work in Dornie 18 years ago but it is only in the past 11 years he has had his own business.He finds the major advantage in being in Dornie relates to the quality of life rather than any financial one.There are disadvantages in being so far from the centres of population and from public services. When he left school he joined the navy.This did not only let him see the world but he met different people.This helped him later in his business.He would recommend this to anyone and quotes the Gaelic proverb"If you think you can or dream you can-begin it."
